name: Born This Way Natural Finish Longwear Liquid Foundation
about: What it is:An oil-free lightweight foundation that masterfully diffuses the line between makeup and skin for undetectable coverage..Coverage:Medium.Finish:Natural.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Coconut Water: Aids in delicately replenishing skinu2019s moisture levels..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This medium-to-full coverage foundation is oil-free and non-comedogenic. Its hydrating formula is longwearing and photo friendly (won't cause flashback)..Clinical Results:In a consumer testing panel of 30 women ages 18 to 35:
ingredients: Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Hexyl Laurate, Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Magnesium Sulfate, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Tribehenin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polysilicone-11, Propylene Carbonate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Cocos Nucifera Water, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Rhododendron Ferrugineum Extract, Alcohol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Lecithin, Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum, Butylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Hyaluronate, EDTA, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)...Please Be Aware That Ingredient Lists May Change Or Vary From Time To Time.  Please Refer To The Ingredient List On The Product Package You Receive For The Most Up To Date List Of Ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply with fingertips, sponge, or a retractable Kkabuki brush (retract until all bristles are dense). .-Start at the center of the face and work outward. .-For light coverage, apply one pump. For medium coverage, apply two pumps. For additional coverage, add more.

reviews.review_title: Good fuller coverage foundation for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty pleased with this foundation! I was looking for something new and wanted to try something with fuller coverage as I am prone to break outs on my forehead. I have very dry skin especially in the winter, so it's hard to find something that doesn't cling to my dry patches, especially when looking for fuller coverage. This really seems to cover all the bases! Coverage is fantastic (and controllable if you want lighter/heavier) and I haven't had many issues with dry patches. On days where I am particularly dry, I will mix in a tiny bit of moisturizer with the foundation and this works perfectly. The color match is spot on for me too, but the shades definitely pull warm, orange, and darku2014never in my life have I referred to myself as being super  pale with rosey undertones lol, so keep that in mind when swatching. If you are very cool-toned and/or very pale, you might not be able to get a good color match.  Only cons are that if I'm not careful with application, it can 1) look cakey in certain areas, and 2) enhance certain lines, but both are only noticeable if I learn very close to the mirror. This may also be a concealer issue and not the foundation, still figuring it out.

And finally I have one that I donu2019t have to mix 3 shades to get the right tone. THANK YOU. I want to buy 3 bottles just in case something changes. Shout out to the cute girl with the beat face at Sephora Universal City who truly helped me find the exact match. u2665ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially it had a good coverage and finish but right after putting it on I had a slight tingle in my face. First day it held up beautifully with a setting powder. I did notice some acne starting, I didnu2019t think much of the acne at first. Second day, exact same skin care routine and setting powder and this foundation separated and creased like thatu2019s what it was made for, even more acne in places that I never get pimples. Gave up on the third day due to waking up with some pretty nasty acne and this being the only change in my skincare/makeup routine. If this works for you then thatu2019s amazing but it didnu2019t do well for me. I have acne prone dry/combo skin that did not mesh with this foundation at all. Returned it and will not repurchase.

reviews.review_text: This stuff is fantastic. I was recommended it when I went into a Sephora location, and have been using it ever since. The match is great, it's lightweight and doesn't cake up or dry out. It doesn't feel like I'm wearing any foundation at all, and I find a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Melts right in the skin perfectly and is my exact shade, was worried it wouldnu2019t be using the shade match finder. my skin glows even more using it, light finish but it  does have a smell not to bothering.  though

reviews.review_title: Best foundation for dry skin, beauty filter effect
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for about 7 years now. I have tried many foundations from different price ranges and this comes out on top because it just makes you feel beautiful (coverage, finish, how it wears, colour match) like you have a filter on, and any tiredness or dullness becomes nonexistent even in environments like work bathrooms! It also plays well with problem skin related to dryness - flakes, texture, redness, sensitivity. I have had some very severe skin conditions and I am always confident that I won't get a reaction from this and it will make my skin look smoother after it's on, instead of emphasizing issues. I'm medium toned with redness and Light Beige is yellow enough to cancel out redness but not look unnatural, I do find the shades run a bit darker than they seem like they would based on the shade name compared to other brands. It is a true satin finish and I would say can easily be full coverage. I prefer a no makeup look, but I use this lightly with a damp beauty blender rather than trying to find another foundation and it doesn't look or feel heavy. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: A must-have in my make up routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is o flawless, it makes my skin feel so hydrated and it doesnu2019t dry the skin. Would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to foundation for a few years now. I've experimented with other brands both cheap and more pricey and this always hits. I'm a sensory girlie so I'm very sensitive to how stuff feels. This feels like a dream to wear. You definitely still feel it but it's very lightweight and moisturizing and full of good ingredients. The color match with my skin tone is amazing, and it's not easy to find a foundation that matches my golden/olive undertone. I feel like I look young when I wear this foundation. It also doesn't have a strong chemical scent like some foundations which is nice. The problem I have with this is longevity. I feel like it doesn't last the entire day.

Within 4 hours it pills and I look insane and decrepit. Even though a sepphora employee helped me find this foundation when I got home I realized itu2019s way too yellow for my skin tone.

Happy to have finally got a perfect shade match in foundation. This gives a very natural finish u2026neither too matte nor too dewy/shiny.

reviews.review_title: A repeat empty and repurchase for nearly a decade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For almost 10 years, this is THE product for medium-full coverage foundation iu2019ve used time and time again. Not only does this foundation blend so beautifully and easily, it photographs so well. Iu2019ve had my fair share of texture and acne scars over the years, but it never fails to provide the coverage I need. Personally I have oily / combo skin; this foundation paired with the milk hydrogrip primer and setting spray seals the deal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it! Itu2019s amazing how it leaves my skin! Iu2019m not an everyday foundation kind of girl but if I was this would be definitely my go to! But I bought it online and used the color match tool and wasnu2019t accurate would r

reviews.review_text: Disappointed. Not only was the color too dark (Sephora do better with shade finder) the undertone is orange. The product says it has a natural finish but it looks like you are wearing makeup. Bad makeup.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Natural Beige - light medium with neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: This product is long lasting and the shade match is incredible. Especially during the summer it never creases or lifts off the face!!!

reviews.review_text: Really wanted to like this but its such a flop. Barely covers anything, not buildable coverage. It looks dry not natural and wears off super quick. Plus it transfers. My as well not even put foundation on. Has a weird smell to it. The color matching is horrible as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation did nothing for me. It didnu2019t blend much on my skin. I will definitely not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: looks amazing on my skin and the shade match is incredible, it doesn't break me out or come off when I'm sweating, would highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a dancer and actually use this foundation when I perform and it does not budge! Gives really good coverage and definitely lasts all day. Usually, I don't even need to spot conceal any acne marks when I wear this. I will say that skin prep is also a huge part in making this foundation look good and last all day. I have dry-to-normal skin and when my skin is only the drier side, it doesn't blend well over those dry patches. But otherwise, a 10/10!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Ivory - very fair with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the finish, but ivory is appearing more light than very light. Too dark and no lighter yellow/golden undertone. 2 stars due to shade description.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had bought this foundation in the wrong shade a year ago, and at the time I didnu2019t really think I liked how it wore, anyway, it was coming off on my smile lines, and it was very yellow for me. I saw it on sale recently and decided to buy it again, as I had exchanged the prior purchase for another foundation.  I wore it while helping a friend move and clean out her apartment, and was sweating heavily - and it stayed put perfectly. It didnu2019t settle into any lines, it didnu2019t even separate along my nostrils where foundations usually do on me. I got the right colour match, and it is now one of my top 3 foundations. I donu2019t know if it was reformulated or I was doing something wrong before, but now, I apply it with a sponge and use the lightest amount of powder, and it is gorgeous!

reviews.review_title: Best foundation Iu2019ve tried so far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a super oily girly so finding a foundation that lasts all day, looks natural yet has a decent coverage without breaking me out is hard. This foundation covers all of the above and is hands down better than any other high end foundations (including double wear by Este Lauder).  Canu2019t recommend it enough. Also, their light beige shade is perfect for blondes with a bit of a tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s been my foundation since I was 16 years old. I doubt Iu2019ll ever stop buying it. Whilst I do own others and not always reach for it, whenever I have a special occasion and donu2019t feel like trying new things this is my go-to. Iu2019m normally a light-medium neutral in most foundations, so I do think the shade names/description is quite far off since warm nude is a pretty good match for me (a tad bit yellow) and is described as u201cvery lightu201d. Nevertheless, a great foundation, natural finish, not heavy on the skin and doesnu2019t sit in fine lines or dry patches, it also doesnu2019t flashback with flash photography and find works well with most concealers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s alright so far. I was using the Mario foundation and I didnu2019t mind that. No real complaints about this foundation yet, except it has a really strong smell at first. Not sure if I will repurchase yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really good. but doesnu2019t blend easily also making foundation layers isnu2019t easy. maybe not worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the past I have definitely been more of a skin tint/CC cream person, and I was definitely a little intimidated by all of the options when i was shopping for what i wanted to be my go to foundation. I like a more natural finish, and found most options too mattifyng. This is one of the best color matches I have found in a face product. It goes on with a very natural finish, definitely giving that u201cyour skin but betteru201d look. Despite my initial concerns about my foundation standing out too much the Born This Way foundation makes me feel very confident and it stays in place all day.

reviews.review_title: Hit or miss- depends on skin type

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this foundation for YEARS. Good for both light coverage and full coverage days. However, I do find that by the end of the day, my forehead is oily (I donu2019t use powder so that may be why) and my cheeks are dry. Definitely looks amazing for a few hours but it just doesnu2019t last.

This literally separates all over my face within hours. Looks super cakey.  Exaggerates all my pores and lines. Transfers. (Used Beauty blender, brush, water based and silicone based primer, always same result) Canu2019t wait to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was recommended  by reddit for super pale skin, and since I basically glow in the dark, I thought I'd give it a shot. While the Two Faced Foundation seems to be a HG for others, it didn't do much for me. This is most likely due to my skin type (dry/ sensitive) which doesn't do well with matte foundation, but there's not a lot of foundation out there for super pale people so I had to give it a try.  Pros -The color when first applied is spot on.  Cons - It has an oxidation issue (i.e. it changes colors in the bottle and on your face. - The foundation has a very chalky finish, not the traditional matte. - It doesn't play well with other products. For example, I have to pile on the blush because the foundation seems to absorb it.  After using this foundation for a while, I've decided I won't purchase it again for the reasons listed above.

reviews.review_title: Almost Perfect But We Forgive Her
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cloud is probably the most spot on color match Iu2019ve ever found in a foundation. For that, I will repurchase this again and again. For the formula, this could be a touch more long wearing for me. But the coverage is amazing and buildable so Iu2019ll allow it!

At first, it was a really great beginner foundation and was my first big girl purchase I made as somebody who was just starting to understand makeup. However, I've found that lately it just hasn't been doing it for me lately. It always emphasizes a lot of texture and settles weirdly into fine lines, abd i've tried everything to get it to last long but it dries up and gets cakey after only a few hours. I've made the switch to other foundations with a similar finish, just without the cakiness. It's a no from me ://

reviews.review_text: Beautiful soft and even color! A little goes a long way. Stays on all day and looks natural. I have dry skin but this Matte formula is so perfect for my skin!

reviews.review_text: I got this at a Sephora during my vacation from an advisor doing my color IQ, when she did the demo samples on me it worked so well so I ended up buying it, and plus it gives you that natural glow that it's like adding fresh skin on your face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is a perfect match for me, but i have found if i dont set it afterwards it becomes a little to transferable , it could be user error, but nevertheless its a good product 4.5-5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this foundation a few times before and I recommended it to my mom who is a 55 years old woman, this is so great for her skin! She has dry mature skin and this is perfect for her, as well as for me, itu2019s hydrating yet it isnu2019t oily, and this last so so so long, I live in a tropical country where the average temperature is over 95u00b0 Fahrenheit and when I tell you this doesnu2019t budge! Also I find it to be very breathable, I think itu2019s more a full coverage foundation however I sometimes use it like a medium coverage one, itu2019s really natural too, looks like a second skin, overall itu2019s pretty good, I myself have dry skin thatu2019s sensitive to fragrance and Iu2019ve never had a problem with this, this is my holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It has been the best foundation I have used.  I like the color match. However, I am very oily and it sometimes separates.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At 36 yrs old, I've tried just about every foundation there is. 20 yrs of experiments had left me almost hopeless when finding a foundation that will not only match ME, but hide my Melasma, acne scars, and lines. The universe put me in the path of Brianna at the Tucson Mall Sephora, and I'm flabbergasted. This foundation looks like my skin, but better. You won't be disappointed.

I absolutely loved the Peach Perfect makeup and had no issue. I hate that it was discontinued. Now Iu2019m afraid to try the 24 hour west version.

I have deeper smile lines and it does sets in the lines but the finish is really nice. I have dry skin after a shower and this doesn't dry out my skin like others. I sometimes I have oiler skin throughout the day if I've been out in the sun and so far, I have noticed my skin looks dewy from this foundation but I light powder takes that away.

Definitely not full coverage and definitely not transfer resistant. After a few hours with (primer and setting spray) it begins to separate and essentially disappear. For the price it should perform better than drugstore. I also tried the matte version and it is 100x better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i hate how much i love this foundation bc itu2019s so expensive, but is so worth it. feels amazing and lasts all day on my combination skin. it is buildable, so i can adjust the amount of product for how much coverage i want. also the only foundation i have ever found to truly match my very cool tone fair skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Swan - very fair with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tested this out for about 4 months now. As a Respiratory therapist student this foundation wears all day, does a good job under masks N95 included. obviously not perfect but by the end of a long day just mild wear off that can be blended with fingers. never looks cakey and always looks natural. has not broke me out which I am very sensitive to fragrance and silicones. the only downside is I don't love that it has no SPF. other than that my absolute go to foundation that gives good coverage buildable to full. I would only recommend for combo and dry skin. Between this and the bareminerals original foundation they are both must haves in your collection in my opinion. I feel confident every time I wear this. I blend it with my fingers as I think it gives the best natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation matches my skin tone exactly and it provided 100% coverage for me. My skincare product is water/gel based and this was the perfect makeup for me. Makeup is no longer cakey and more pores hardly show.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Swan - very fair with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this its really lightweight it feels like nothing on skin. It doesn't crease. Its medium coverage but you can build it the coverage up .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I circled back to this foundation after not using it for a couple year and rediscovered how much I love it. It smooths out my skin, is full coverage, and doesnu2019t feel super heavy on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's okay but there's so many better options really. The packaging is very pretty. I returned it for the hourglass one and wow big difference! Will not repurchase...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I always get asked if I wear foundation because of how great this product is, itu2019s my favourite makeup product Iu2019ve maybe ever used!
